member.name: CERT_QC_STATEMENTS_EXT_INFO
member.summary: The CERT_QC_STATEMENTS_EXT_INFO structure contains a sequence of one or more statements that make up the Qualified Certificate (QC) statements extension for a QC.

member.name: CERT_QC_STATEMENTS_EXT_INFO.cStatement
member.summary: A value that represents the size, in bytes, of the rgStatement array.

member.name: CERT_QC_STATEMENTS_EXT_INFO.rgStatement
member.summary: An array of structures that contains the sequence of statements that make up the QC statements extension.
